Log message handler type.

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ metal_log_level

enum metal_log_level

Log message priority levels for libmetal.

Enumerator
METAL_LOG_EMERGENCY 

system is unusable.

METAL_LOG_ALERT 

action must be taken immediately.

METAL_LOG_CRITICAL 

critical conditions.

METAL_LOG_ERROR 

error conditions.

METAL_LOG_WARNING 

warning conditions.

METAL_LOG_NOTICE 

normal but significant condition.

METAL_LOG_INFO 

informational messages.

METAL_LOG_DEBUG 

debug-level messages.

void metal_default_log_handler ( enum metal_log_level  level,
const char *  format,
  ... 
)

Default libmetal log handler. This handler prints libmetal log messages to stderr.

Parameters
[in]levellog message level.
[in]formatlog message format string.
Returns
0 on success, or -errno on failure.
